alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Floyd; Howard; Mitchell (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 19 at 7:27AM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeast Iowa through 815 AM CDT... At 726 AM CDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Rudd, or 12 miles east of Mason City, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Rudd around 730 AM CDT. Floyd around 745 AM CDT. Charles City around 750 AM CDT. Elma around 810 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Lylahs Marsh County Park, County Roads B 33 And T 76, County B 17 And Bell Avenue, Rock Creek, Idlewilde State Park, Howardville, Brownville, County Roads B 20 And T 26, Highways 9 And 218 and Bassett. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
